title: Pixel 4A Power button Issues
content:
I came here looking to see if others have an issue with the 4a's power button not always working, I typically have to press it 2-3 times... ie it seems i need to get it "just right" or it stays turned off.

I thought maybe it was a software issue so waited for the Nov. Update to Android 11 but it did not help this issue at all , so now I am thinking I have a hardware Issue instead.

Thanks

KB
